short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove the twitch section from esportal.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do you think that the twitch autoplay feature on esportal.com is annoying?  Then this is the extension for you! It will remove the livestream section every time you enter the site.
